features: Pillow Core Material: Memory Foam; Pillow Case Material: 100% Polyester

【SAY GOODBYE TO NECK PAIN & SLEEPLESS NIGHTS!】Hexus pillows are not only an excellent addition to your sleep routine but also scientifically proven to have health benefits. The innovative hollow center promotes healthy spinal alignment, significantly reducing the risk of stiff necks, muscle aches, and other sleep-related issues. Additionally, our pillows ensure proper breathing, minimizing snoring by allowing unobstructed air passage, providing you with a restful sleep every night.

【INVEST IN YOUR SLEEP & HEALTH WITH THE BEST PILLOW】Are you tired of tossing and turning all night long, only to wake up with a sore neck or back? According to surgeon Andrew Hecht, MD, a wrong pillow can worsen headaches, neck pain, shoulder and arm numbness. But with Hexus's neck pillow, you get all the curves, divots, and angles needed to alleviate pressure and tension, with a refined contour design that caters to side, back, and stomach sleepers.

【PERFECT FOR ALLERGY SUFFERERS & HOT SLEEPERS】Say goodbye to sweaty, uncomfortable nights with Hexus's neck support pillow, featuring a 3D mesh fiber pillowcase that allows heat to dissipate and fresh air to circulate. If you have allergies or are sensitive to smells, opt for our Hexus memory foam pillow, which is original, odorless, and made from high-quality materials that are CertiPUR-US certified, sleep more peacefully.

【TWO HEIGHTS AND ARMREST DESIGNS】Finding the ideal height for your pillow can be challenging, but with our Hexus cervical pillow, it's no longer an issue. Our contour pillow comes with two different height options, providing a customized sleep experience, perfect for all sleeping positions. Simply rotate your bed pillow 180 degrees to enjoy a higher or lower contour! The unique armrest design allows you to relax with your arms under the pillow, taking your comfort to a whole new level.

【HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE & FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE】We believe that everyone deserves a restful and comfortable night's sleep, and when you choose our Hexus Contour Pillow, it's easy to enjoy a pain-relieving night's sleep every night! Moreover, it doubles as an excellent gift for your parents, friends, and colleagues, long-term usage will greatly improve the quality of sleep. If you have any questions about our products, our customer service team is available 24/7 to meet your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For neck comfort
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the Hexus Pillow Neck Support, and it has truly transformed my sleep experience. As someone who often wakes up with a stiff neck, finding the right pillow has been a game-changer, and I can confidently say that this one has exceeded my expectations.The first thing that caught my attention was the pillow's thoughtful design. The contour shape provides excellent support to the neck and shoulders, promoting a natural alignment of the spine. This has significantly reduced the discomfort I used to feel in the morning.The memory foam used in the pillow is of premium quality. It's both soft and supportive, molding perfectly to the shape of my neck without losing its resilience over time. The pillow strikes a perfect balance between plush comfort and firm support, creating a luxurious feel without sacrificing functionality.What sets this pillow apart is its versatility. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, the Hexus Pillow adapts seamlessly to your preferred sleeping position. The medium loft ensures that it's suitable for a wide range of sleepers, making it a versatile choice for individuals with different preferences.Another notable feature is the hypoallergenic cover, which is not only soft to the touch but also easy to clean. It's a thoughtful addition for those with allergies, providing a clean and healthy sleeping environment.After using the Hexus Pillow for a few weeks, I've noticed a significant improvement in the quality of my sleep. I wake up feeling more rested and free of the usual neck pain I used to endure. It has truly become an essential part of my nightly routine.While the Hexus Pillow Neck Support may come with a slightly higher price tag, the investment is undoubtedly worth it for the unparalleled comfort and neck support it provides. If you're looking to upgrade your sleep experience and bid farewell to neck pain, I highly recommend giving this pillow a try. It's a small price to pay for the priceless gift of a good night's sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable pillow no matter how you sleep!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has been so amazing to help me stay comfortable, cool and get a great nights sleep whether I sleep on my side, stomach or back. The memory foam is really dense and comfortable, keeping my neck aligned and relaxed…no more tossing and turning! I really love the raised sides that allow your arms to cradle in without shifting the pillow to strain your neck. This pillow has a much higher quality memory foam that gives me piece of mind in knowing that the pillow will hold its shape and maintain comfort longer than others I have tried. I also love that it not only comes with a pillow case that is cooling and breathable but it’s also washable too. I’d highly recommend this pillow, my sleep quality has been so much better with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have cervical kyphosis/military neck and have recently had issues with pinched nerves causing me to reevaluate my sleeping situation. I purchased a *very expensive* Tempurpedic contour pillow last year with high hopes, as I absolutely loved my previous pillow of the same brand for over ten years until I realized it was likely the cause of my pinched nerves since it had no support for my neck whatsoever. The contour pillow was an improvement but I found it to be a bit uncomfortable when sleeping on my side and almost impossible when sleeping on my stomach. I wasn't so sure about this pillow upon first glance but decided to give it a try anyway. While I can't say for sure whether it's actually helping my neck or not (no pinched nerves or other pain/discomfort as of the writing of this review), I will say that it's surprisingly comfortable to sleep on despite it's odd shape. It cradles my head quite well for being flat-headed and petite. What was even more surprising is how much I prefer side-sleeping on this pillow, as it provides support for my face unlike any other pillow I've tried where I'd typically tuck a hand underneath. Stomach-sleeping is also pretty comfortable and provides contours for you to "hug" the pillow without crushing your arms under the weight of your own head. I love that it still fits regular pillow cases (pictured in a cotton-linen blend king case with the excess tucked in). Overall a good buy for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cervical Pillow on the Market
reviews.reviewText: First night it relieved my normal neck pain. The pillow aliens your neck with your spine and makes for a Very comfortable night sleep. The pillow also forms to your head and shoulders to make for a comfortable night sleep. The construction of the pillow is extremely well made and will last for many years. My experience with this pillow is excellent and I purchased 5 more for friends and family. Look no further for other brands this one works!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, supportive pillow!
reviews.reviewText: The shape of this pillow is perfect to support my neck all night. I am a side sleeper and it is very comfortable for me. The perfect fit pillow case is soft and easy to remove to wash. The pillow stays cool during the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic Pillow for All Sleep Types
reviews.reviewText: I change sleep positions throughout the night, and this pillow has been great for all - sleep on my side, stomach or back. The memory foam of this pillow if of premium quality and has the right firmness, dense enough to support my neck and head while soft enough for comfort. Unlike many other memory foam products I've purchased in the past, this pillow does not emit/outgas any fume/smell, and I can use it right after it arrives without the need to air it out for a day or two. The cover this pillow comes with is soft and plushy. This pillow is definitely worth the price, and I highly recommend this to anyone seeking a ergonomic pillow for a good night's sleep.
Good neck support and very comfortable despite the odd shape.
